text.more: Nodes displayed are either respondents to the survey or were listed as collaborators in the survey. The data only displays reported collaborations, so it is not representative of the entirety of the network.
text.intro: This network shows reported collaboration between respondents to the South Side Stem Asset Mapping Survey. Employers can be found in yellow — Click on a node to see reported connections and other statistics.
text.title: South Side Stem Asset Mapping — All Respondents
